author: MSNBC.com
title: To negotiate? Or not to negotiate? That is the COVID relief question.
description: Ohio Congressman Tim Ryan criticizes Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell when it comes to another Coronavirus relief bill, claiming he “is protecting his incompetency right now by not even bringing the bill up that we’ve had on his desk since May 15.”
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Suspects in alleged Michigan kidnap plot would be “domestic terrorists” if convicted
description: More than a dozen men are in custody, charged for plotting to kidnap Michigan’s Democratic Governor. The Daily Beast’s Political Reporter Will Sommer says, “The most disturbing thing about this whole situation was how organized it was.” If convicted, these su…
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Shaky cease-fire in place between Armenia & Azerbaijan
description: Former Spokesperson for the U.S. Mission to the United Nations, Hagar Chemali, breaks down the escalating conflict between Armenia and Azerbaijan, the significance of what’s happening in the region and what role the United States is playing right now.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Broadway remains dark through May 2021 but the show must go on
description: Tony Award Winner James Monroe Iglehart tells NBC’s Joshua Johnson “the one thing we have seen through history is that theater always comes through and it will come back…Broadway is not going anywhere.”
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: America’s COVID crisis raises a big question: Are we going to do the right thing?
description: President Trump says he’s learned a lot from contracting COVID-19, but he held an in-person event Friday at the White House. NBC’s Joshua Johnson discusses the need to hold oneself accountable for acting honorably in 2020.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Pete Buttigieg responds to Amy Coney Barrett’s opening statement
description: Amy Coney Barrett’s opening statement before her Senate confirmation hearings begin is analyzed in part by Pete Buttigieg, former Democratic 2020 presidential candidate, on the impact Barret joining the Supreme Court could have on LGBTQ+ and other rights.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Rep. Brenda Lawrence responds to militant anti-maskers: ‘All we’re trying to do is keep people alive’
description: Democratic Rep. Brenda Lawrence of Michigan pushes back on criticism of Gov. Whitmer’s COVID restrictions, recalling how Detroit funeral directors had to buy trailers for the overflow of bodies as the pandemic ravaged the city.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Michigan voters discuss the terrorist plot against Gov. Whitmer: ‘Absolutely despicable’
description: Voters in Detroit discuss the rise of white supremacist and anti-government militias in Michigan with MSNBC’s Ali Velshi during the fifth stop of the “Velshi Across America 2020” tour, covering eight swing states before the election.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump claims he no longer has Covid-19, says he’s ‘immune’
description: President Trump says he no longer has Covid-19, but what the doctors memo indicates is that Trump is not contagious anymore, which is different than not having the virus, NBC’s Kelly O’Donnell reports.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: SCOTUS nominee releases opening statement ahead of confirmation hearings
description: Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett released her full opening statement ahead of her Senate confirmation hearings. Judge Barrett is set to address the Senate Judiciary Committee on October 12.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Sen. Harris to attend SCOTUS hearing remotely from Senate office
description: Sen. Kamala Harris announced that she will attend the SCOTUS hearing for Amy Coney Barrett remotely from the Senate office. NBC News’ Deepa Shivaram reports.

title: Fears of a “Blue Wave” grow among Republicans

title: Grassroots campaign highlights toll of family separations in new ads

title: 'It's a shame that we're getting fewer debates because the one we had scratched the surface of the policy differences between the candidates. Chief among them: immigration.'

author: MSNBC.com
title: Pelosi: Trump’s latest stimulus proposal ‘grossly inadequate’
description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., called President Trump’s latest stimulus proposal “grossly inadequate." Rep. Ruben Gallego D-Ariz., said the White House’s offer falls short in terms of unemployment as well as local and state funding.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump administration calls for new stimulus package days after the President called off negotiations
description: The Trump administration's COVID relief offer has hit several more roadblocks after failing to address several of the main Democratic priorities in an offer that Speaker Pelosi called “grossly inadequate" and "wholly insufficient". MSNBC’s “American Voices” h…
